testcase.system-out: Given kullanici "amazonUrl" anasayfaya gider................................passed And arama kutusuna "Nutella" yazip aratir...................................passed Then ilk urunu tiklar.......................................................passed And urun isminin "Nutella" icerdigini test eder.............................passed And sayfayi kapatir.........................................................passed
